fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Pandemonium: The first time you empty your hand, activate a Minigun?! that targets a random 4 non-Chaos people. The attack will appear to be from nobody.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Ruse: Discard 2 cards in your hand and choose a player. The next attacking card from a non-Chaos player will target them. [Infinite uses, 3 CD]
- Scheme: Discard 3 cards in your hand. All attacking cards Chaos plays in this phase will appear to come from other non-Chaos players. [2 uses, Unique] 
- Capitalize: Gain a non-special card of your choice. Gains a use every 5 cards you discard using your abilities. [1 use, Recharging, 0/5]
